page.title: 05 Rhodes Farm
page.content: The{Farm_house}was built in{1657 of{limestone,}with{wooden beams}and there is still some{original wattle. { }In the{old fireplace}is a beam with {spit-holes}and a{salt hole,}used for keeping salt dry. In the farmyard was an old{Tithe {Barn}used now as{stables.}The farmer owns 15 horses of his own and also has 11 others used in the{Riding Stables. He also has 8{peacocks. In one of the rough pastures is a grass{Motorcycle Track}used 4 times a year. In the{Cantern Brook}valley below the farm lie 2{Trout Pools}used by fishermen. The farm consists of{58 acres}and has fields for{pasture}or for{crops for winter fodder for the horses.
